section.11: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) led us in prayer, and we did not hear him recite: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. And Abu Bakr and Umar led us in prayer and we did not hear it from them either
